page.title: 07Colchester United F.C.
page.content: {Colchester United F.C.}is in the 4th Division of the Football League. There are 16 full time and 9 part time players. There are 10 paid officials of the club. The average home attendance for league matches 1984_85 was only 2077. The club runs a 1st team, reserve team and youth team. The ground is not up to 2nd Division standard. The stands are very old and terraces are cracking. The club is not in debt but it stuggles to keep going. It has to raise money from lotteries sponsership, advertising,etc. The main aim of the club is to bring back families to matches. Sporting U's is a club,charity organisation which for 6 days a week provides many sports activities for young and old. The Club hopes it will move to a new all purpose stardium soon.{Will this bring {back the crowds?
